Title: My Love
Writer: Ivan Shmelyov (screenplay based on his novel)
Actors: Aleksandr Palamishev, Aleksandra Zhivova, Evgeniya Kryukova, Nina Ruslanova
Plot: In nineteenth-century Russia, a teenage boy in search of love is drawn to two very different women.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 1 nomination.
